General.Name: Chalet Hotels Limited
General.Description: Chalet Hotels Limited owns, develops, manages, and operates hotels in India. It also operates rental and annuity, and real estate development business. The company's portfolio comprises seven operating hotels, including commercial property. In addition, it engages in construction and development of residential properties. The company was incorporated in 1986 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
General.Address: Raheja Tower, Plot No.C-30, Mumbai, India, 400051
